mapper.insert: insert into user(userId, userPw, userName, userPhone, userAddress, userGrade) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress}, #{userGrade})
mapper.select: select * from user where userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw} and userGrade = #{userGrade}
select count(userId) from user where userId = #{userId}
select userId from user where userName = #{userName} and userPhone = #{userPhone}
select userPw from user where userId = #{userId} and userName = #{userName} and userPhone = #{userPhone}
mapper.update: update user set userPw = #{userPw} , userPhone = #{userPhone} , userAddress = #{userAddress} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(userPw) from user where userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw}
